metadata.title: CVE-2022-48665 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: exfat:fix overflow for large capacity partition Using int type for sector index,there will be overflow in a large capacity partition. For example, ifstorage with sector size of 512 bytes and partition capacity is larger than2TB, there will be overflow.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
